text: Newman's Law is a 1974 American crime thriller movie directed by Richard T. Heffron and starring George Peppard, Eugene Roche, Roger Robinson, Louis Zorich, Abe Vigoda, David Spielberg, Kip Niven and was distributed by Universal Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1974 crime thriller movies Category:American crime thriller movies Category:Movies directed by Richard T. Heffron
title: Newman's Law
